channel.title: Posts on SINFU LIN's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on SINFU LIN's blog

item.description: Linux exploit的第一篇分享 Exploit Education上的題目：Stack-six， 如果是新手從前面做題目下來，應該都會小卡一陣子吧 XD.. https://exploit.education/phoenix/stack-six/ Code Analysis 先來看一下程式碼 有一個地方是原題漏掉的，不知道大家看到有沒有覺得奇怪 char *what = GREET; 那這個GREET是什麼東東 後來發現漏掉一行程式碼： #define GREET “Welcome, I am pleased to meet you“ //這段程式碼驗證有沒有 ExploitEducation的環境變數，沒的話則exit ptr = getenv("ExploitEducation"); if (NULL == ptr) { // This style of comparison prevents issues where you may accidentally // type if(ptr = NULL) {}.. errx(1, "Please specify an environment variable called ExploitEducation"); } 沒的話就給一個吧： export ExploitEducation= $(cyclic 140) env | grep ExploitEducation // 這段程式碼將maxSize大小限制在最多127 char buffer[128]; int maxSize; maxSize = strlen(who); if (maxSize > (sizeof(buffer) - /* ensure null termination */ 1)) { maxSize = sizeof(buffer) - 1; } 有問題的程式碼在哪邊？？ 有sense的觀眾應該猜得到跟下面兩行有關XD
